item.title: Markdown
item.description: Markdown .hg-preamble { color: #868e96; width: 90%; padding: 0rem; margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; position: relative; } .hg-preamble p { color: #5c8799; font-size: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; font-style: italic font-weight: 100; display: block; line-height: 1.25em; margin: 0rem; padding: 0rem; position: relative; z-index: 2; } Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax. Its design allows it to be converted to many output formats which is the crucial part for efficient authoring of content.
